casebody.data:
SUNNYBROOK GOLF, BOWL & MOTEL, INC., Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
CITY OF STERLING HEIGHTS, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157691
COA: 340649 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 16, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 20, 2018.
